attributes.action: Charge Scotland, Wales, N.Ireland for NHS prescriptions.
attributes.additional_details: England are the only country in the UK to pay for medical prescriptions, per item. Scotland, Wales and N.Ireland don’t pay, with them 3 country’s paying for the prescriptions the money should go to the NHS to help fund them
attributes.background: The NHS need funding, so by charging the other 3 country’s in the UK to pay for the prescriptions like England do per item will help the funding.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the delivery of public health services - including prescription charges - in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland are a matter for the Scottish Government, Welsh Government and Northern Ireland Executive, not the UK Government or Parliament.
